name: Real Terrorist Combat
description:
Real Terrorist Combat puts you in real combat situations and is one of the best fps 3d shooting games you will ever play! Enjoy nail-biting shooting and amazing missions that will awake the real soldier in you! Can you pass through all levels featuring hard enemies with mighty weapons just like you?! It’s a war in which you need to win with great precision and shooting skills. Start your combat shooting and complete all missions and levels.

FEATURES
- 3D first person shooter with dangerous combats
- play shooting games in offline & online
- hard and challenging enemies
- free combat shooting game
